title: Beyond graphene: exploring the potential of MXene anodes for enhanced lithium–sulfur battery performance
content:

Zeshan Ali Sandhu, Kainat Imtiaz, Muhammad Asam Raza, Adnan Ashraf, Areej Tubassum, Sajawal Khan, Umme Farwa, Ali Haider Bhalli, Abdullah G. Al-Sehemi
The high theoretical energy density of Li–S batteries makes them a viable option for energy storage systems in the near future.
